# {{ site.title }}

> {{ site.description }}

## About This Repository

This documentation repository contains information about {% if site.github.project_title %}{{ site.github.project_title }}{% else %}{{ site.title }}{% endif %}. This file is designed to help AI assistants better understand the structure and purpose of this documentation.

## Table of Contents

1. [Main Documentation Sections](#main-documentation-sections)
2. [Key Topics](#key-topics)
3. [API Endpoints](#api-endpoints)
4. [Recommended Starting Points](#recommended-starting-points)
5. [Additional Resources](#additional-resources)

{% endfor %}

## Key Topics
{% assign all_tags = '' | split: '' %}
{% for page in site.pages %}
  {% if page.tags %}
    {% assign page_tags = page.tags %}
    {% for tag in page_tags %}
      {% assign all_tags = all_tags | push: tag %}
    {% endfor %}
  {% endif %}
{% endfor %}

{% assign unique_tags = all_tags | uniq | sort %}
{% if unique_tags.size > 0 %}
{% for tag in unique_tags %}
- **{{ tag }}**
{% endfor %}
{% endif %}

## API Endpoints
{% assign api_endpoints = '' | split: '' %}
{% for page in site.pages %}
  {% if page.api_endpoints %}
    {% for endpoint in page.api_endpoints %}
      {% assign api_endpoints = api_endpoints | push: endpoint %}
    {% endfor %}
  {% endif %}
{% endfor %}

{% assign unique_endpoints = api_endpoints | uniq | sort %}
{% for endpoint in unique_endpoints %}
- `{{ endpoint }}`
{% endfor %}
